name: MEC Camp Together Camp Chair - Children
description: For seasons of fireside and beachfront fun, this durable camp chair uses breathable mesh with 600-denier polyester in high stress areas. The cup holder fits a nice cup of hot chocolate, and the chair locks in position so kids can move about without the chair collapsing.Made of powder-coated steel, with breathable mesh and 600-denier reinforcements.Chair locks when unfolded to prevent accidents.Armrests and upper back are padded for support.Includes a stuff sack with carry handle.
